name: Nylas N1
description: Nylas N1 is an open source email client that supports plug-in framework and can be extended to create powerful new features. It's compatible with hundreds of email service providers, provides a good application appearance and offline function.

zh_CN.description: Nylas N1是一个开源的邮件客户端，它支持插件框架，可以扩展创建强大的新功能，它兼容上百个邮件服务提供商，提供良好的程序外观并具有离线功能。
zh_CN.name: Nylas N1
